meanings.definition: A small bag for carrying personal belongings or equipment.
meanings.sent1: I always keep my essentials in my kitbag when I go hiking.
meanings.sent2: She slung her kitbag over her shoulder before heading to the gym.
meanings.sent3: The kitbag looked like a tiny treasure chest filled with her favorite things.
meanings.sent4: Her kitbag was a magic portal to a world of adventure and exploration.
meanings.sent5: The bright red kitbag stood out against the dull landscape, a beacon of preparedness.

meanings.definition: To pack or store items in a kitbag.
meanings.sent1: Before the trip, he would carefully kitbag his clothes and gear.
meanings.sent2: She decided to kitbag all her winter clothes to make space in the closet.
meanings.sent3: He kitbagged his snacks so well that he forgot where he put them!
meanings.sent4: She kitbagged her memories in her mind, ready to unpack them when needed.
meanings.sent5: The way he kitbagged his emotions made it hard for others to understand him.
